 10  * that the code/component(s) do NOT become part of another Open Source or Commercially
 11  * licensed development library or toolkit without explicit permission.
 12  * 
 13  * License details: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl.html

 15 
 16 Ext.ns('Ext.ux.form');
 17 
 18 /**
 19  * @class Ext.ux.form.DateTime
 20  * @extends Ext.form.Field
 21  */
 22 Ext.ux.form.DateTime = Ext.extend(Ext.form.Field, {
 23     /**
 24      * @cfg {String/Object} defaultAutoCreate DomHelper element spec
 25      * Let superclass to create hidden field instead of textbox. Hidden will be submittend to server
 26      */
 27      defaultAutoCreate:{tag:'input', type:'hidden'}
 28     /**
 29      * @cfg {Number} timeWidth Width of time field in pixels (defaults to 100)
 30      */
 31     ,timeWidth:100
 32     /**
 33      * @cfg {String} dtSeparator Date - Time separator. Used to split date and time (defaults to ' ' (space))
 34      */
 35     ,dtSeparator:' '
 36     /**
 37      * @cfg {String} hiddenFormat Format of datetime used to store value in hidden field
 38      * and submitted to server (defaults to 'Y-m-d H:i:s' that is mysql format)
 39      */
 40     ,hiddenFormat:'Y-m-d H:i:s'
 41     /**
 42      * @cfg {Boolean} otherToNow Set other field to now() if not explicly filled in (defaults to true)
 43      */
 44     ,otherToNow:true
 45     /**
 46      * @cfg {Boolean} emptyToNow Set field value to now if on attempt to set empty value.
 47      * If it is true then setValue() sets value of field to current date and time (defaults to false)
 48     /**
 49      * @cfg {String} timePosition Where the time field should be rendered. 'right' is suitable for forms
 50      * and 'bellow' is suitable if the field is used as the grid editor (defaults to 'right')
 51      */
 52     ,timePosition:'right' // valid values:'bellow', 'right'
 53     /**
 54      * @cfg {String} dateFormat Format of DateField. Can be localized. (defaults to 'm/y/d')
 55      */
 56     ,dateFormat:'m/d/y'
 57     /**
 58      * @cfg {String} timeFormat Format of TimeField. Can be localized. (defaults to 'g:i A')
 59      */
 60     ,timeFormat:'g:i A'
 61     /**
 62      * @cfg {Object} dateConfig Config for DateField constructor.
 63      */
 64     /**
 65      * @cfg {Object} timeConfig Config for TimeField constructor.
 66      */
 67 
 68     // {{{
 69     /**
 70      * private
 71      * creates DateField and TimeField and installs the necessary event handlers
 72      */
 73     ,initComponent:function() {
 74         // call parent initComponent
 75         Ext.ux.form.DateTime.superclass.initComponent.call(this);
 76         this.validationTask = new Ext.util.DelayedTask(this.validate, this);
 77         // create DateField
 78         var dateConfig = Ext.apply({}, {
 79              id:this.id + '-date'
 80             ,format:this.dateFormat || Ext.form.DateField.prototype.format
 81             ,width:this.timeWidth
 82             ,selectOnFocus:this.selectOnFocus
 83             ,validationEvent: false
 84             ,listeners:{
 85                   blur:{scope:this, fn:this.onBlur}
 86                  ,focus:{scope:this, fn:this.onFocus}
 87             }
 88         }, this.dateConfig);
 89         this.df = new Ext.form.DateField(dateConfig);
 90         delete(this.dateFormat);
 91 
 92         // create TimeField
 93         var timeConfig = Ext.apply({}, {
 94              id:this.id + '-time'
 95             ,format:this.timeFormat || Ext.form.TimeField.prototype.format
 96             ,width:this.timeWidth
 97             ,selectOnFocus:this.selectOnFocus
 98             ,validationEvent: false
 99             ,listeners:{
100                   blur:{scope:this, fn:this.onBlur}
101                  ,focus:{scope:this, fn:this.onFocus}
102             }
103         }, this.timeConfig);
104         this.tf = new Ext.form.TimeField(timeConfig);
105         delete(this.timeFormat);
106 
107         // relay events
108         this.relayEvents(this.df, ['focus', 'specialkey', 'invalid', 'valid']);
109         this.relayEvents(this.tf, ['focus', 'specialkey', 'invalid', 'valid']);
110 
111     } // eo function initComponent
112     // }}}
113     // {{{
114     /** private 
115       * It buffers the validation events
116       */
117     ,filterValidation: function(e){
118         if(!e.isNavKeyPress()){
119             this.validationTask.delay(this.validationDelay);
120         }
121     }
122 
123     ,destroy: function(){
124       if(this.df.rendered){
125         this.df.destroy();
126       }
127       if(this.tf.rendered){
128         this.tf.destroy();
129       }
130       Ext.ux.form.DateTime.superclass.destroy.call(this);
131     }
132     /**
133      * private
134      * Renders underlying DateField and TimeField and provides a workaround for side error icon bug
135      */
136     ,onRender:function(ct, position) {
137         // don't run more than once
138         if(this.isRendered) {
139             return;
140         }
141 
142         // render underlying hidden field
143         Ext.ux.form.DateTime.superclass.onRender.call(this, ct, position);
144 
145         // render DateField and TimeField
146         // create bounding table
147         var t;
148         if('bellow' === this.timePosition) {
149             t = Ext.DomHelper.append(ct, {tag:'table',style:'border-collapse:collapse',children:[
150                  {tag:'tr',children:[{tag:'td', style:'padding-bottom:1px', cls:'ux-datetime-date'}]}
151                 ,{tag:'tr',children:[{tag:'td', cls:'ux-datetime-time'}]}
152             ]}, true);
153         }
154         else {
155             t = Ext.DomHelper.append(ct, {tag:'table',style:'border-collapse:collapse',children:[
156                 {tag:'tr',children:[
157                     {tag:'td',style:'padding-right:4px', cls:'ux-datetime-date'},{tag:'td', cls:'ux-datetime-time'}
158                 ]}
159             ]}, true);
160         }
161 
162         this.tableEl = t;
163         this.wrap = t.wrap({cls:'x-form-field-wrap'});
164         this.wrap.on("mousedown", this.onMouseDown, this, {delay:10});
165 
166         // render DateField & TimeField
167         this.df.render(t.child('td.ux-datetime-date'));
168         this.tf.render(t.child('td.ux-datetime-time'));
169         this.df.getEl().on("keyup",this.filterValidation,this);
170         this.tf.getEl().on("keyup",this.filterValidation,this);
171 
172         // workaround for IE trigger misalignment bug
173         if(Ext.isIE && Ext.isStrict) {
174             t.select('input').applyStyles({top:0});
175         }
176 
177         this.on('specialkey', this.onSpecialKey, this);
178         this.df.el.swallowEvent(['keydown', 'keypress']);
179         this.tf.el.swallowEvent(['keydown', 'keypress']);
180 
181         // create icon for side invalid errorIcon
182         if('side' === this.msgTarget) {
183             var elp = this.el.findParent('.x-form-element', 10, true);
184             this.errorIcon = elp.createChild({cls:'x-form-invalid-icon'});
185 
186             this.df.errorIcon = this.errorIcon;
187             this.tf.errorIcon = this.errorIcon;
188         }
189 
190         // we're rendered flag
191         this.isRendered = true;
192         this.validate();
193     } // eo function onRender
194     // }}}
195     // {{{
196     /**
197      * private
198      */
199     ,adjustSize:Ext.BoxComponent.prototype.adjustSize
200     // }}}
201     // {{{
202     /**
203      * private
204      */
205     ,alignErrorIcon:function() {
206         this.errorIcon.alignTo(this.tableEl, 'tl-tr', [2, 0]);
207     }
208     // }}}
209     // {{{
210     /**
211      * private initializes internal dateValue
212      */
213     ,initDateValue:function() {
214         this.dateValue = this.otherToNow ? new Date() : new Date(1970, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0);
215     }
216     /**
217      * private initializes internal timeValue
218      */
219     ,initTimeValue:function() {
220         this.timeValue = this.otherToNow ? new Date() : new Date(1970, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0);
221     }
222     // }}}
223     // {{{
224     /**
225      * Disable this component.
226      * @return {Ext.Component} this
227      */
228     ,disable:function() {
229         if(this.isRendered) {
230             this.df.disabled = this.disabled;
231             this.df.onDisable();
232             this.tf.onDisable();
233         }
234         this.disabled = true;
235         this.df.disabled = true;
236         this.tf.disabled = true;
237         this.fireEvent("disable", this);
238         return this;
239     } // eo function disable
240     // }}}
241     // {{{
242     /**
243      * Enable this component.
244      * @return {Ext.Component} this
245      */
246     ,enable:function() {
247         if(this.rendered){
248             this.df.onEnable();
249             this.tf.onEnable();
250         }
251         this.disabled = false;
252         this.df.disabled = false;
253         this.tf.disabled = false;
254         this.fireEvent("enable", this);
255         return this;
256     } // eo function enable
257     // }}}
258     // {{{
259     /**
260      * private Focus date filed
261      */
262     ,focus:function() {
263         this.df.focus();
264     } // eo function focus
265     // }}}
266     // {{{
267     /**
268      * private
269      */
270     ,getPositionEl:function() {
271         return this.wrap;
272     }
273     // }}}
274     // {{{
275     /**
276      * private
277      */
278     ,getResizeEl:function() {
279         return this.wrap;
280     }
281     // }}}
282     // {{{
283     /**
284      * @return {Date/String} Returns value of this field
285      */
286     ,getValue:function() {
287       return(this.getDateTime());
288     } // eo function getValue
289     // }}}
290     // {{{
291     /**
292      * @return {Boolean} true = valid, false = invalid
293      * private Calls isValid methods of underlying DateField and TimeField and returns the result
294      */
295     ,isValid:function() {
296         return this.df.isValid() && this.tf.isValid();
297     } // eo function isValid
298     // }}}
299     // {{{
300     /**
301      * Returns true if this component is visible
302      * @return {boolean} 
303      */
304     ,isVisible : function(){
305         return this.df.rendered && this.df.getActionEl().isVisible();
306     } // eo function isVisible
307     // }}}
308     // {{{
309     /** 
310      * private Handles blur event
311      */
312     ,onBlur:function(f) {
313         // called by both DateField and TimeField blur events
314 
315         // revert focus to previous field if clicked in between
316         if(this.wrapClick) {
317             f.focus();
318             this.wrapClick = false;
319         }
320 
321         // update underlying value
322         if(f === this.df) {
323             this.updateDate();
324         }
325         else {
326             this.updateTime();
327         }
328         this.updateHidden();
329 
330         // fire events later
331         (function() {
332             if(!this.df.hasFocus && !this.tf.hasFocus) {
333                 var v = this.getValue();
334                 if(String(v) !== String(this.startValue)) {
335                     this.fireEvent("change", this, v, this.startValue);
336                 }
337                 this.hasFocus = false;
338                 this.fireEvent('blur', this);
339             }
340         }).defer(100, this);
341 
342     } // eo function onBlur
343     // }}}
344     // {{{
345     /**
346      * private Handles focus event
347      */
348     ,onFocus:function() {
349         if(!this.hasFocus){
350             this.hasFocus = true;
351             this.startValue = this.getValue();
352             this.fireEvent("focus", this);
353         }
354     }
355     // }}}
356     // {{{
357     /**
358      * private Just to prevent blur event when clicked in the middle of fields
359      */
360     ,onMouseDown:function(e) {
361         this.wrapClick = 'td' === e.target.nodeName.toLowerCase();
362     }
363     // }}}
364     // {{{
365     /**
366      * private
367      * Handles Tab and Shift-Tab events
368      */
369     ,onSpecialKey:function(t, e) {
370         var key = e.getKey();
371         if(key == e.TAB) {
372             if(t === this.df && !e.shiftKey) {
373                 e.stopEvent();
374                 this.tf.focus();
375             }
376             if(t === this.tf && e.shiftKey) {
377                 e.stopEvent();
378                 this.df.focus();
379             }
380         }
381         // otherwise it misbehaves in editor grid
382         if(key == e.ENTER) {
383             this.updateValue();
384         }
385 
386     } // eo function onSpecialKey
387     // }}}
388     // {{{
389     /**
390      * private Sets the value of DateField
391      */
392     ,setDate:function(date) {
393         this.df.setValue(date);
394     } // eo function setDate
395     // }}}
396     // {{{
397     /** 
398      * private Sets the value of TimeField
399      */
400     ,setTime:function(date) {
401         this.tf.setValue(date);
402     } // eo function setTime
403     // }}}
404     // {{{
405     /**
406      * private
407      * Sets correct sizes of underlying DateField and TimeField
408      * With workarounds for IE bugs
409      */
410     ,setSize:function(w, h) {
411         if(!w) {
412             return;
413         }
414         if('bellow' == this.timePosition) {
415             this.df.setSize(w, h);
416             this.tf.setSize(w, h);
417             if(Ext.isIE) {
418                 this.df.el.up('td').setWidth(w);
419                 this.tf.el.up('td').setWidth(w);
420             }
421         }
422         else {
423             this.df.setSize(w - this.timeWidth - 4, h);
424             this.tf.setSize(this.timeWidth, h);
425 
426             if(Ext.isIE) {
427                 this.df.el.up('td').setWidth(w - this.timeWidth - 4);
428                 this.tf.el.up('td').setWidth(this.timeWidth);
429             }
430         }
431     } // eo function setSize
432     // }}}
433     // {{{
434     /**
435      * @param {Mixed} val Value to set
436      * Sets the value of this field
437      */
438     ,setValue:function(val) {
439         if(!val && true === this.emptyToNow) {
440             this.setValue(new Date());
441             return;
442         }
443         else if(!val) {
444             this.setDate('');
445             this.setTime('');
446             this.updateValue();
447             if(this.rendered){
448               this.validate()
449             } 
450             return;
451         }
452         val = val ? val : new Date(1970, 0 ,1, 0, 0, 0);
453         var da, time;
454         if(val instanceof Date) {
455             this.setDate(val);
456             this.setTime(val);
457             this.dateValue=new Date(val);
458             this.timeValue=new Date(val);
459         }
460         else {
461             da = val.split(this.dtSeparator);
462             this.setDate(da[0]);
463             if(da[1]) {
464                 this.setTime(da[1]);
465             }
466         }
467         this.updateValue();
468         if(this.rendered){
469           this.validate()
470         }
471 
472     } // eo function setValue
473     // }}}
474     // {{{
475     /**
476      * Hide or show this component by boolean
477      * @return {Ext.Component} this
478      */
479     ,setVisible: function(visible){
480         if(visible) {
481             this.df.show();
482             this.tf.show();
483         }else{
484             this.df.hide();
485             this.tf.hide();
486         }
487         return this;
488     } // eo function setVisible
489     // }}}
490     //{{{
491     ,show:function() {
492         return this.setVisible(true);
493     } // eo function show
494     //}}}
495     //{{{
496     ,hide:function() {
497         return this.setVisible(false);
498     } // eo function hide
499     //}}}
500     // {{{
501     /**
502      * private Updates the date part
503      */
504     ,updateDate:function() {
505 
506         var d = this.df.getValue();
507         if(d) {
508             if(!(this.dateValue instanceof Date)) {
509                 this.initDateValue();
510             }
511             this.dateValue.setMonth(0); // because of leap years
512             this.dateValue.setFullYear(d.getFullYear());
513             this.dateValue.setMonth(d.getMonth());
514             this.dateValue.setDate(d.getDate());
515         }
516         else {
517             this.dateValue = '';
518         }
519     } // eo function updateDate
520     // }}}
521     // {{{
522     /**
523      * private
524      * Updates the time part
525      */
526     ,updateTime:function() {
527         var t = this.tf.getValue();
528         if(t){
529           if (!(t instanceof Date)) {
530             t = Date.parseDate(t, this.tf.format);
531           }
532           if(!(this.timeValue instanceof Date)) {
533             this.initTimeValue();
534           }
535           this.timeValue.setHours(t.getHours());
536           this.timeValue.setMinutes(t.getMinutes());
537           this.timeValue.setSeconds(t.getSeconds());
538         } else {
539           this.timeValue='';
540         }
541     } // eo function updateTime
542     // }}}
543     // {{{
544     ,getDateTime: function(){
545       if(this.dateValue instanceof Date && this.timeValue instanceof Date){
546         var dt=new Date();
547         dt.setHours(this.timeValue.getHours());
548         dt.setMinutes(this.timeValue.getMinutes());
549         dt.setSeconds(this.timeValue.getSeconds());
550         dt.setMonth(0); // because of leap years
551         dt.setFullYear(this.dateValue.getFullYear());
552         dt.setMonth(this.dateValue.getMonth());
553         dt.setDate(this.dateValue.getDate());
554         return(dt);
555       } else if(this.dateValue instanceof Date){
556         return(new Date(this.dateValue));
557       }
558       return("");
559      
560     }
561     /**
562      * private Updates the underlying hidden field value
563      */
564     ,updateHidden:function() {
565         if(this.isRendered) {
566           var value="";
567           var dt=this.getDateTime();
568           if(dt instanceof Date){
569             value=dt.format(this.hiddenFormat);
570           }
571           this.el.dom.value = value;
572         }
573     }
574     // }}}
575     // {{{
576     /**
577      * private Updates all of Date, Time and Hidden
578      */
579     ,updateValue:function() {
580 
581         this.updateDate();
582         this.updateTime();
583         this.updateHidden();
584 
585         return;
586     } // eo function updateValue
587     // }}}
588     // {{{
589     /**
590      * @return {Boolean} true = valid, false = invalid
591      * callse validate methods of DateField and TimeField
592      */
593     ,validate:function() {
594       var tValid=this.tf.validate();
595       var dValid=this.df.validate();
596       if(dValid){
597         this.df.clearInvalid();
598       }
599       if(tValid){
600         this.tf.clearInvalid();
601       }
602       if(dValid && tValid){
603          this.updateValue();
604          return(this.validateValue(this.getValue()));
605        }
606        return(false);
607     } // eo function validate
608     // }}}
609     // {{{
610     ,markInvalid: function(msg){
611       this.df.markInvalid(msg);
612       this.tf.markInvalid(msg);
613      }
614      ,clearInvalid: function(){
615        this.df.clearInvalid();
616        this.tf.clearInvalid();
617      }
618 
619     /**
620      * Returns renderer suitable to render this field
621      * @param {Object} Column model config
622      */
623     ,renderer: function(field) {
624         var format = field.editor.dateFormat || Ext.ux.form.DateTime.prototype.dateFormat;
625         format += ' ' + (field.editor.timeFormat || Ext.ux.form.DateTime.prototype.timeFormat);
626         var renderer = function(val) {
627             var retval = Ext.util.Format.date(val, format);
628             return retval;
629         };
630         return renderer;
631     } // eo function renderer
632     // }}}
633 
634 }); // eo extend
635 
636 // register xtype
637 Ext.reg('xdatetime', Ext.ux.form.DateTime);
638
